text: @narendramodi @narendramodi #MannKiBaat Idea to put break on #COVID19India also keep running economy - "Complete lock-down on Saturday & Sunday of every week". PM must try this on coming weekend by asking everyone to stay home on Saturday & Sunday and see are we able to break chain of #covid19
